item.title: Importance of verifying hash on the server side during authentication
item.description: Overview User authentication is a critical aspect of web applications, ensuring that only legitimate users gain access to protected resources. When integrating third-party authentication systems, such as the Telegram Login Widget, it becomes crucial to validate the received data on the server side. In this article, we’ll delve into the process of hash verification and its significance in maintaining the security of your web application. Authentication with Telegram Login Widget In the context of my web application, I chose to leverage the Telegram Login Widget for user authentication.
